title: VideoEncoderProperties
description: Specify VideoEncoder options such as profile, bitrate, ...

rateCtrlMode.title: RateControlMode
rateCtrlMode.description: Rate control mode specifies if constant or variable bitrate should be used (H264 / H265)

profile.title: VideoEncoderProfile
profile.description: Encoding profile, H264, H265 or MJPEG

bitrate.title: Bitrate [kbps]
bitrate.description: Specifies prefered bitrate of compressed output bitstream

maxBitrate.title: Maximum Bitrate [kbps]
maxBitrate.description: Specifies maximum bitrate of compressed output bitstream

keyframeFrequency.title: Keyframe frequency
keyframeFrequency.description: Every x number of frames a keyframe will be inserted

numBFrames.title: Number of B Frames
numBFrames.description: Specifies number of B frames to be inserted

width.title: Frame Width
width.description: Input and compressed output frame width

height.title: Frame Height
height.description: Input and compressed output frame height

numFramesPool.title: Number of frames in pool
numFramesPool.description: This options specifies how many frames are available in this nodes pool (can help if receiver node is slow at consuming
